title: Lesson 1 — Nose Wins
know: Nose breathing slows the spin and filters the world. Mouth is for arguments and soup.
try: Close your mouth gently. In through the nose. Out through the nose. No force. If it jams, take a normal breath and rejoin.

title: Lesson 2 — The 1:2 Ratio
know: Longer out than in nudges the nervous system toward 'we’re not being chased.'
try: Count in 1-2-3 … out 1-2-3-4-5-6. Smooth edges; no gasping.
everyday: On hold with a flute solo playing

title: Lesson 3 — No Pauses, No Cliffs
know: Holds can spike the system. We stay continuous. No cliffs at the edges of the breath.
try: Breath rolls in, breath rolls out, no stopping at the corners.
everyday: Walking past the snack that judges you
The moment you open your banking app
